page.title: List of on-line payment service providers

revisions.rev:
The following is a list of [[WP:CORP|notable]] on-line [[payment service provider]]s: *[[Adyen]] *[[Amazon Payments]] *[[Authorize.net]] *[[Beenz]] *[[Cashbox|CashBox]] *[[Chargify]] *[[ClickandBuy]] *[[CreditCall]] *[[CyberBucks]] (of [[DigiCash]]) *[[CyberSource]] *[[Dwolla]] *[[Elavon]] *[[Flooz]] *[[HSBC]] *[[iKobo]] *[[KlickEx]] *[[MercadoLibre.com#MercadoPago|MercadoPago]] *[[Mondex]] *[[Moneybookers]] *[[MPP Global Solutions]] *[[Neteller]] *[[Ouroboros]] *[[PayPal]] (Payflow/Verisign Payflow) *[[Payoneer]] *[[PayPoint.net]] *[[Paysafecard]] *[[PayXpert]] *[[Peppercoin]] *[[Recurly]] *[[Sage_Group|Sage Pay]] *[[Vindicia]] *[[WebMoney]] *[[WePay]] *[[Wirecard]] *[[WorldPay]]
==See also== *[[Bitcoin]] * [[Ripple monetary system]]
[[Category:On-line payment]]
